html: It’s time for government to update our laws in order to protect a free and open internet.
text: It’s time for government to update our laws in order to protect a free and open internet.

html: Regulating the internet under this antiquated 1930s law has prohibited small internet companies from making investments in rural areas, which runs counter to the rural broadband investments I continue to push for.
text: Regulating the internet under this antiquated 1930s law has prohibited small internet companies from making investments in rural areas, which runs counter to the rural broadband investments I continue to push for.

html: That's why I’m supporting three bills that allow the @FTC to ensure true net neutrality by: Prohibiting blocking, throttling, and paid prioritization for internet trafficking Creating more transparency from internet service providers.
text:
That's why I’m supporting three bills that allow the @FTC to ensure true net neutrality by: 

Prohibiting blocking, throttling, and paid prioritization for internet trafficking 
 Creating more transparency from internet service providers.

html: Regulating the internet under a law that was written to regulate telephones that had dials and party lines is not the way we protect net neutrality.
text: Regulating the internet under a law that was written to regulate telephones that had dials and party lines is not the way we protect net neutrality.

html: By incorporating technologies & other innovations, we have the opportunity to increase safety and efficiency in our surface transporation system. I believe we can get this done & I look forward to working with my colleagues this Congress to achieve this goal.

html: As the reauthorization process moves forward, it is essential that we find ways to build more efficiently – to stretch the Federal dollar. We need to identify & attack hidden project costs by streamlining the project delivery process & reducing burdensome regulations.
text: As the reauthorization process moves forward, it is essential that we find ways to build more efficiently – to stretch the Federal dollar. We need to identify & attack hidden project costs by streamlining the project delivery process & reducing burdensome regulations.

html: Not only is adequate infrastructure investment important to mobility, it also creates jobs and allows our economy to prosper.
text: Not only is adequate infrastructure investment important to mobility, it also creates jobs and allows our economy to prosper.

html: Our current surface transportation system has significant needs & it will only get worse as we look to plan for the future. Underinvestment has taken its toll on the system’s ability to move people and freight – we face increasing congestion, delays, & safety issues.
text: Our current surface transportation system has significant needs & it will only get worse as we look to plan for the future. Underinvestment has taken its toll on the system’s ability to move people and freight – we face increasing congestion, delays, & safety issues.

html: The Highway Trust Fund is not able to meet our surface transportation needs as they stand today, let alone our future needs. Congress & the Administration must come together & find a way to shore-up the HTF, providing sustainable funding for our surface transportation programs.
text: The Highway Trust Fund is not able to meet our surface transportation needs as they stand today, let alone our future needs. Congress & the Administration must come together & find a way to shore-up the HTF, providing sustainable funding for our surface transportation programs.

html: The surface transportation reauthorization bill will allow the Federal government to continue its long-standing role in infrastructure investment. But we have some big challenges and opportunities before us.
text: The surface transportation reauthorization bill will allow the Federal government to continue its long-standing role in infrastructure investment. But we have some big challenges and opportunities before us.

html: This being our first hearing on reauthorization, it is important to note how critical this bill is to ensuring a good quality of life for all Americans and to support the U.S. economy.
text: This being our first hearing on reauthorization, it is important to note how critical this bill is to ensuring a good quality of life for all Americans and to support the U.S. economy.

html: The FAST Act, which provided $281 billion for federal surface transportation programs, expires on September 30, 2020. @EleanorNorton @RepPeterDeFazio @RepSamGraves and I will work together to develop a long-term, bipartisan bill to reauthorize surface transporation programs.
text: The FAST Act, which provided $281 billion for federal surface transportation programs, expires on September 30, 2020. @EleanorNorton @RepPeterDeFazio @RepSamGraves and I will work together to develop a long-term, bipartisan bill to reauthorize surface transporation programs.

html: By repealing these outdated provisions that unfairly penalize public servants in Illinois, we can provide some certainty to retirees while helping to recruit future teachers, firefighters, and police officers.
text: By repealing these outdated provisions that unfairly penalize public servants in Illinois, we can provide some certainty to retirees while helping to recruit future teachers, firefighters, and police officers.

html: This bill ensures that a teacher who spends his or her summers working a second job or a police officer who changes careers after years of service will not face a possible 40 percent reduction in their Social Security benefits.
text: This bill ensures that a teacher who spends his or her summers working a second job or a police officer who changes careers after years of service will not face a possible 40 percent reduction in their Social Security benefits.

html: These two titles of the Social Security Act unfairly reduce or eliminate Social Security benefits for millions of Americans who have devoted much of their careers to public service.
text: These two titles of the Social Security Act unfairly reduce or eliminate Social Security benefits for millions of Americans who have devoted much of their careers to public service.

html: This week, I introduced the bipartisan Social Security Fairness Act, which eliminates the Windfall Elimination Provision (WEP) and the Government Pension Offset (GPO).
text: This week, I introduced the bipartisan Social Security Fairness Act, which eliminates the Windfall Elimination Provision (WEP) and the Government Pension Offset (GPO).

html: BREAKING: EACH Act unanimously passes the House. The EACH Act broadens the religious exemption of the ACA to ensure those who rely solely on a religious method of healing, like Christian Scientists, are not forced to choose between following their religion or violating the law.

The VA MISSION Act, which was signed into law last month, is a big step in reforming the VA and will make institutional changes so that patients will always be put first.

html: A new Community Based Outpatient Clinic, which is part of the VA Illiana Health Care System, opened a few weeks ago in Decatur. It is imperative we provide quality care for our veterans and this facility will help provide better access to the care they need.pic.twitter.com/NdRsaQDRoM
